events.title: Sleeping Beauties: Reawakening Fashion
events.description: This exhibition explores fashion masterpieces from The Costume Institute's collection, bringing historical garments to life through innovative display techniques.
events.location: The Met Fifth Avenue, 1000 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY

events.title: Abstract Art Workshop for Beginners
events.description: Learn the fundamentals of abstract art in this hands-on workshop. Materials provided.
events.location: MoMA, 11 West 53rd Street, New York, NY

events.title: Contemporary Art and Digital Culture
events.description: A fascinating lecture exploring how digital technology is reshaping contemporary art practices.
events.location: NYU Institute of Fine Arts, 1 East 78th Street, New York, NY

events.title: Traditional Japanese Tea Ceremony
events.description: Experience the meditative art of the Japanese tea ceremony, performed by master practitioners.
events.location: Asia Society, 725 Park Avenue, New York, NY

events.title: Arctic Exploration: Climate Change at the Poles
events.description: Join renowned Arctic explorer Dr. Sarah Mitchell as she shares her latest findings from the North Pole.
events.location: The Explorers Club, 46 East 70th Street, New York, NY

events.title: Women Artists of the Harlem Renaissance
events.description: A day-long symposium celebrating the contributions of women artists during the Harlem Renaissance.
events.location: New-York Historical Society, 170 Central Park West, New York, NY

events.title: Summer Members Exhibition Opening
events.description: Opening reception for the annual members exhibition featuring works by club artists.
events.location: National Arts Club, 15 Gramercy Park South, New York, NY

events.title: Family Art Workshop: Egyptian Treasures
events.description: Explore ancient Egyptian art and create your own masterpiece inspired by the collection.
events.location: The Met Fifth Avenue, 1000 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY
